column4: Segment details
kids playing + gru enters
gru talks to one kid about brushing teeth
kids jumping and playing with gru before bedtime
kids convincing gru to tell them a bedtime story
gru reading the sleepy kittens story to the kids
gru tells the kids to sleep but kids ask gru for good night kisses
kids talk to each other as they go to bed (they talk to each other about gru)
gru walks away from the door and thinks about family
gru and dr. nefario talk about launching their plans for a heist as gru is picking up the dolls, but gru decides to push the plans to another day
gru walks away from Dr. nefario
minions are playing with a copier and in the backgroup a device becomes larger and larger
minions continue playing with the copier
gru and the kids are playing tea party when they hear the door bell ring
gru excuses himself and goes to the door
gru opens the door and sees the adoption lady who is angry with him
dr nefario shows up at the door, and gru realizes he has to get the girls ready to go
kids leave gru reluctantly, get into the car with the adoption lady and gru and the kids are sad
gru and dr nefario enter back into the house as the minions watch through the window
gru is sad (doesn't eat, stares at the wall as the minions clean up the kids drawings)
kids are in the orphanage in boxes of shame as punishment
gru is still sad at home on the bed and sees the kids toys and screams
minions are all working around as gru prepares for launch
scene cuts to one of the kids staring at the sky and back to gru who is doing the same in a space suit
gru is on his way to the top of the shuttle as one minion talks to him about the kids dance recital and stuffs the ticket stub in his pocket
gru enters the spaceship and gets ready for the lauch
the countdown begins and the launch sequence is initiated. Outside the house, the ground shakes and spaceship appears, as vector appears on scene
the spaceship launches as vector also gets on to it
gru communicates with dr nefario as vector appears. Gru shocks vector who falls to the earth
vector falls to earth, but launches his flight suit. He then hits an electric pole and gets electrocuted
gru launches into space, and we see a minion in space floating around. Gru makes it to space and launches the next phase.
